review: While the device is easy to set-up and use, I'm only giving it one star due to the fact that I constantly get a "low memory" warning. While it states 8gb of memory, my understanding is only 5.5gb is useable. I'm not a gamer and have only a minimal number of apps stored. I even deleted many of the apps that came with the device, yet I'm still getting the "low memory" warning. This issue also affects the quality of video streaming.
